nodes.text: Shirro was a Human male who was the leader of the Blood Razors Swoop gang on the planet Biivren.

While projecting a rough image, Shirro was caring and concerned about the well-being of the people under his protection. He ran the Blood Razors as a way to provide support to the inhabitants of the poor sections of the industrial sector.
Shirro carried a metal pipe to use as a melee weapon and kept it in a sheath on his swoop bike. He also carried a blaster carbine.
